feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Formula response types by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15002
  • Fix block native search by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15026
  • Cleanup npm package config by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15030

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.5...3.2.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bypass transformers that are trivial, allow users to configure bson buffer size. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15032
  • Bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15031

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.6...3.2.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Dependency checking as part of package build by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15036
  • Add sqs to the datasource test matrix. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15039
  • Add github-actions Jest reporter. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15040
  • Direct describe rather than datasourceDescribe by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15027
  • dependency upgrades for security scanners by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15004
  • Fix test-libraries yarn invocation. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15044

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.9...3.2.10
